['Thank you so much! I‚Äôll check it out.', "Ugh, we should've done that! We leave our MOP on the hand off because too many people were complaining that there was confusion and yada yada.", 'He‚Äôs my boyfriends cat and a complete sweetheart. He loves a good canoodle \U0001f97a', 'Was with my ex from 15-23 and loved him unconditionally. We lived together and went to school together, but didn‚Äôt see each other often due to opposite schedules. 

I decided to end things with him this past January because I realized everything was so one-sided. He was controlling and manipulative and I was unhappy for two years, but lied to myself and said it was a ‚Äúrough patch‚Äù. Once I finally woke up, I was heart broken that he wasn‚Äôt the person I was making him out to be in my head. I carried a lot of guilt for loving someone that didn‚Äôt love me the way I deserved. My latest issue is having self-doubt because how could I have been ‚Äúso sure‚Äù that I was going to be with someone forever, and then have that not be the case?? This has caused a lot of anxiety and insecurities, but my therapist has helped tremendously. 

About two months after my break up, I began dating one of my friends from school. It was supposed to be a casual hookup, as he was also going through a heartbreak, but ooops, feelings got involved. He is the complete opposite from my ex. He‚Äôs affectionate, caring, understanding, comforting, thoughtful, honestly the list can go on. 

Going from a 7 year relationship and immediately jumping into another only two months later was a whole new type of emotional whirlwind. Guilt/embarrassment for not being single that long, guilt for letting myself be unhappy for so long when <ITALIC> this is how I should‚Äôve been treated, etc. but your emotions don‚Äôt have a timeline. I didn‚Äôt plan for any of that to happen. I‚Äôm still working on self love and compassion, while also having someone amazing by my side.']

I‚Äôd give you my links but they‚Äôre all on my computer and I‚Äôm using Reddit on mobile. Based on my limited reading though there‚Äôs no real ‚Äúgotcha‚Äù for macadamia, which is nice to know! I didn‚Äôt even think to look into that.

["[OC] Made a simplified character sheet for my 8 year old's first run with DnD. She likes it! We're gonna start playing tonight!", 'I occasionally have a "YOU GET ONE!" policy.

Gens popping quickly, wait to open the gate.

Instantly open it and then I go block the other gate lever.

...You get ONE.', 'Oh I'll tell you.

As she paid at the register she mentioned that good mac and cheese has bread crumbs on the top and ham cubes mixed in.  She also told me about a "great slow cooker recipe" online that involved mixing ground beef and veggies and spices.

This woman was expecting a tiny cheesey macaroni casserole for one dollar.', 'Two old ladies came in for lunch EVERY Sunday at a cafe I worked at.

The owner of the place is a youth probation officer - so he doesn't understand the logistics of running a restaurant.  Only one waitress/barista per shift.  The shift was about 9 hours depending on how long clean-up took.

The espresso machine makes ONE drink at a time.  At full capacity there are ten tables (28 maximum seated customers) plus whoever is standing at the counter for a drink or baked good on the go.

So...  One sunday we are at full capacity.  I was having back problems for a while at that point, I have a line of people waiting for lattes and such.  I send the 15 year old dish washer out to refill drinks at the tables cause I couldn't find half a second to check on everyone.

My two favorite old bitties already had their food and there was a point where I was able to look over at their table and hold my thumb up in a questioning manner like "Everything good?"

They both smiled and nodded and I went back to the grind.

After the rush cleared, I started cleaning up tables and they had left me a note saying, "We hope your back is holding up through all this.  You are doing a great job!"  Under the note was a ten dollar tip.  They usually only tipped two bucks each.

...Just that simple note was the important thing.  They remembered the casual chat we had the previous Sunday where I mentioned my back.  They tipped extra due to my overall performance rather than the attention I paid to their table.  Hell, they didn't know that waitresses there worked for tips ONLY at the time.  

It just meant a lot in context.']

['You could be biromantic asexual. It‚Äôs also possible to be an oriented ace, or maybe you‚Äôre even grey or Demi. Really only you can know for sure (I know that answer sucks sometimes) but I‚Äôd just think about what it is you really want. Like is it a romantic relationship? A sexual one? Does this feel like an odd or rare event? Are they already people you have another connection with?', 'My name is Alexandra and I have gotten this my entire life for always going by Alex. I can‚Äôt wait to get it changed to just Alex. I hate the full thing. I‚Äôm not her. 

Also can‚Äôt wait to stop getting the ‚Äúyou‚Äôre not Alex, are you?‚Äù Or ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt be Alex,‚Äù just because they thought I was a girl.', 'I‚Äôm still questioning too, but I relate to almost all of this. The only difference for me is I‚Äôm ace and the idea of sex and masturbation is a big no for me. Though lately I think it‚Äôs just the idea of it as a girl that bothers me. I hope someone here can give you the answers you‚Äôre looking for! But you‚Äôre definitely not alone.', 'This is me. I‚Äôve been growing my hair for 20 years because I thought having long hair would make me feel like a girl, and my step mom always told me I should have long hair and nails because other girls weren‚Äôt so lucky. 

I‚Äôve worn it pulled back in a ponytail almost everyday of my life. Recently questioning if I‚Äôm FTM and am super excited to cut all my hair off tomorrow and donate it. Thinking of myself with short hair and wearing ‚Äúguys‚Äù clothes makes me ecstatic.', 'Hi! I can‚Äôt give you a lot of answers because I‚Äôm still figuring it out too, but I can say you‚Äôre not alone. I‚Äôm early 20s AFAB asexual aromantic as well and relate with a lot of what you‚Äôve said. I‚Äôm pretty sure I‚Äôm a trans male at this point, but I feel a lot of doubt still sometimes and worry that it‚Äôs a phase or I just want attention (but I hate attention so that‚Äôs unlikely) and am not ready to tell my family, especially my very Christian dad‚Äôs side. I know you said gender therapy is our, but I would see if you can find other resources be it in books or various subs here for now. Reading others stories can really help. 

You can also feel free to message me if you need/want to talk. I think getting it all out helps to process everything, whether in text to someone, talking aloud, or writing it just for you.']

I am leaning towards thinking he was an asshole for doing what he did, but if you want to continue being friends you'll need to listen to his side of the story too. ['So I have a potentially stupid question... ((PS4)) 
 Since Christmas, sometimes when I play as killer I will get a message from a survivor I'm facing while we're still in the lobby...

This has happened to me maybe 5 times.  I'm not upset in any way other than I don't understand how they're doing it.  When I ask the survivors how they did it, most of them don't reply.  One just said, "You can see the killers handle while you're in the lobby."

I've been playing since day one of the PS4 release.  Since this happened, I'll wait out the full minute as survivor looking all over the screen and pressing buttons trying to figure this out, but as far as I can tell the killer is still completely anonymous until the scoreboard pops up.

Googled but didn't find anything.

So here I am in the sub...  Anybody know how this is done?

Side note:  I've been working A LOT and come home with enough time to play a few rounds before bed.  This is the first time I've visited the sub since Early December.  Imagine my amazement seeing all this Jigsaw stuff!!!  HOLY CROW!!!', 'I just miss them because they were easy on my teeth.

Always had a sensitive bite and regular or Chewy granola bars hurt so much.

Kudos were soft and delicious.', 'By gen rush, I mean bringing BNPs and such.  I fully understand that the gens are basically the ONLY objectives for survivors.

I suppose mentioning the gen rush is more of a call to give survivors something else to do as well.  Extend the round a little, ya know.  A lot of people think gen repair goes too fast, for instance.  When finding a lobby as a solo player takes 10 minutes and you get in the game for 5 minutes of rushed play - I kinda feel cheated.

This was a suggestion I made a while back that was probably never seen by any DEV...  But to extend play we need more things to do:



<ITALIC> "7 gens are on the map at the start. 5 need to be repaired to power the gates...

<ITALIC> Still, once 5 are powered, there's 7 gens cranking away, lights ablaze.

<ITALIC> Two exit gates... Both with levers... Both with lights on the top...

<ITALIC> Out of the 7 generators, give 4 of them "bulbs" at random.

<ITALIC> Once the gates are powered, you now have to roam the map as survivor and find the light bulbs to complete the electricity circuit to the lever. Two light bulbs per gate.

<ITALIC> Like those old lanterns from events of the past, a survivor must shuttle the light bulbs to the gate. If the killer downs you, you drop it where you fall. Your mates can pick it up or you can once you've been unhooked/get the wiggle.

<ITALIC> I imagine ten-twenty extra minutes per round."', 'Non-verbal communication on PS4... 
 I'm a survivor main...  Just a simple question here...

We have pointing and "come hither" but when someone is on the hook, what are you trying to tell me?

I'll head toward a hook where somebody is just staying still, unhook and everything is gravy.

But sometimes I'll head toward a hook, and somebody will do a partial escape attempt, no heart beat nearby...  I'll unhook and again, everything is gravy.

But then I'll head toward a hook, see partial attempts, and see the killer camping...

So, when you play...  Do partial attempts mean "Come get me, it's safe!" or do they mean "Stay away, he's still close!"

I've seen it used both ways and would like a solid answer to bank on.']

['Aww idk if they are but they seem supportive. Did you wind up coming out to them if you don‚Äôt mind me asking?', 'Yup lol. I hope so badly but I don‚Äôt think Disney would allow it. But that won‚Äôt stop us.', 'Well it rlly depends on the map etc. but a good lineup is always: 
Attack: 

Hard Breacher: Typically thermite but depending on the map can be any of the 2 (now 3). Never hurts to bring one and you can always open up a site with they and It will always make it easier to access sight for planting, etc. also allows for the opening of reinforced hatches 

Soft Destruction op: typically sledge or buck. These ops allow for vertical play and for the destruction of any soft wall. Great for creating rotations on attack. And kings of sight through floors. This can also be important on maps where a thatcher dies early. You can often find a soft floor above where the bandit/laid is playing and pick them off and take out there gadget. 

Enemy gadget destruction: Typically IQ, thatcher, Twitch. Ops are primarily used for the destruction of enemy equipment and allow for easier pushes or hardbreaching without having to worry about the bandit/Kaid/Mistro/Kap/etc.

Entry Fragger/Destruction: typically can be used for hunting ops that are roaming and for quick pushes. Also can be used for extra destruction of soft wall or as destraction. Main purpose though is to drop kills. Not always necessary and can be replaced with an op for extra utility and support 

Support and info gathering: ops like finka, Cap, Nokk, could included IQ, Twitch: basically used to assist in helping the rest of the team. Weather that be Info gathering, extra nades, cutting off rotations. Ops like Monty. Cap is always a decent idea for this one. His guns decent. His bolts can help cut off rotations and his smoke helps bring some extra utility. 

This is just attack. If you want I can do defense as well. And this isn‚Äôt necessarily the best lineup but one that my friends and I like to run that helps. Each person has a set job. If someone needs assistance you can always swap ops around and have multiple of one area. If you want some good ideas of this watch some pro league and how each person has an op that has their own job.', 'Ayy looks like your getting it. Just make sure when you fire weapons you stand still or crouch otherwise the spray pattern goes everywhere.
You may know that tho. But yeah hey keep on moving sounds you‚Äôll get even better']

["Blister adhesive reaction? 
 I went to a convention on Saturday and was wearing body and face tape. I've had some slight issues with adhesives before (bandaids/medical tape), but it never went farther than some itching and redness after a day or so. So, I thought I'd be fine for the day.

When I was still at the convention, I noticed some pain and itchiness on my face, but thought it was just tension since it had been around 10 hours. When I took my tape off later, though, it was extremely painful and blisters formed! Some of them popped or tore and leaked. The worst is on my boob, though.

The blister must have been forming under the tape, and when I ripped it off, it completely took off the top layer. It keeps leaking, won't scab over and hurts like HELL. (I do have a neuromuscular condition that's probably affecting my pain levels, though.) I've tried putting DuoDerm on it, but it leaked so much it lifted one edge and got my shirt, skin, and bandage all crusty and nasty.

It doesn't smell, but it is yellow and sticky. The other blisters were filled with yellow fluid, too. (They've gone down today.) I've slapped a fresh piece of DuoDerm on it for now, but is that okay? Should I use something else instead?

Also, does anyone know why I may have reacted so bad this time?  Is it an allergic reaction or something else?

I am planning to see my doctor if it gets any worse, but for now it's not getting better OR worse. Really not sure what to do.", "Grandmother won't let 7yo learn 
 My fiance, his mother, my mother, and I have been desperately trying to get my fiance's niece (who we are attempting to gain custody of) caught up in reading. She's in 1st grade and is VERY far behind. I'm disabled, so I have her on my own most of the time that she's not in school, but my fiance's grandmother has her the rest of the time. She is driving me up the wall. She's extremely apathetic toward Eve, and has no patience. Instead of sitting down and making her sound out words or reading with het, she just tells her what it is or gives her her tablet to play on. I've tried putting educational games on the tablet (even sprang for ABC Mouse), and she just downloads whatever crappy, mind-numbing game Eve wants. Not only that, but she deletes the educational ones!!! I don't even know why! I'm at the absolute end of my rope. Everything I try to do to enforce good behavior, curiosity for learning, and positive habits just gets undermined as soon as she goes home for the night. I understand that my grandmother-in-law is older and tired after work and all, but her bad habits are hurting Eve. She won't listen when we try to tell her. I've even showed her Eve's grades and reading scores from school. I'm trying not to cause too much friction because of the ongoing custody battle, but sometimes I just want to scream.

Has anyone else had a similar problem? Is there anything else I can do?", 'Is it dangerous or toxic? I have cats.', "Where to get an Armadillo Lizard? 
 My fianc√© has been talking about getting an Armadillo Girdled Lizard (he wants the one with the spikes all around) It would be his first reptile. However, we live together, and I have a lot of experience with everything from anoles to geckos to a full blown iguana. However, I can't find much information on them through googling, other than that you CAN have them as a pet, and they're apparently very docile.

Does anyone have information on where to buy one and what care they need? I'd like to make it a wedding present."]

['Note that many bunkers are not fully underground and a lot of them are at least partially above ground.  And yes a bunker is a building.', 'Gah. Why do I do this to myself?', "This is a rift that has been deepening ever since the Tea Party started, so since about a decade ago when Obama was first running for president.

Here in Belgium we have a similar rift but it's less obvious, for one because the rift is very geographically split with the northern half of the country voting for the nationalists and the fascists as two biggest parties, and the south voting for the socialists and the communists as their two biggest parties.  So in every day life most people notice the rift here much because the two halves of the country do not interact all that much, since we have different languages we also have completely split media.

BUT having said that, our last elections were over a year ago and we still do not have a new government, exactly because of this geographic rift in voting patterns.", "I don't know about France and Germany.  

Generally speaking, police only have jurisdiction in their own country.  So if something is reported in Belgium even if the closest police are in France, only the Belgian police can respond.  

However for Belgium and France there is an agreement between the two about what happens when police is in hot pursuit of a suspect.  Belgian Police can keep chasing a subject in France when they cross the border, up to 20km deep in France.  Belgian Police must inform the French Police though so they can come in and take over.  It also works the other way around."]

I like it when we hug in a good circumstance like saying hi after not seeing eachother for a while üòä", 'Everyone I'm close to wants to die, too 
 Everyone I'm truly close to is just as suicidal as me

And its hell. Because if I want to die every second of every day, they do too. And that's terrifying. 

The only thing keeping me here is the fact that I love these people too much to leave them. And I'm sure they have no qualms leaving me to do this alone. The person I care about the most probably doesnt even want to be around me, so he wouldn't care if I would spiral without him. 

I just want to be there for them like they are for me. I want them to stay with me and idk how to do that.

It makes me happy to know they trust me and they dont want to suffer alone. Some of them have therapists, yeah, but the ones I care about the most (theres 2) dont. And they're the worst off. 

I'm scared every day, especially when they repress their feelings or hold it all in. Because doing that is what brought me to my low point.

I'm just lost, I guess. If I lose any of them I dont know if I'll have the motivation to keep going either.']

['If you have a scanner, you can print it out and add the gridlines with a ruler, and then scan the image back in.

Or you throw it into a pattern maker :D', 'I prefer Kit.

Less hassle, simple as that.

I might change the fabric though, if the count is too small for me (as in, 14 and under. I prefer 16 and up)', '[Chat] Best way to remove blood stains? x_x 
 Yeah, I.... ran into a serious problem...

When I was still in the beginning of my Madonna Cross-Stitch (for reference: <DESCRIPTION> <LINK> ), I pulled the fabric tight into the hoop, only to notice afterwards, that my thumb was slightly bleeding. So I created a row of small blood stains on the piece.

Since I'm not the typical housewife, instead of washing it out right then and there, I thought "eh, let's see if I happen to stitch over them and remove the visible stains later!"

Problem is, the red and blue threads (which make up 80% of the project) should've been washed before stitching, which means they'd probably bleed out if I wash the entire project.

Today I tried a foamy detergent on the spots and water, but it didn't helped.

My mom recommended to stitch pearls over the stains (since they're aligned in a circle, like all the other pearls), thought about stitching them over with white, since the white thread is barely visible against the fabric.

But I'd rather remove the stains then changing anything at the pattern.

So... any suggestions? .\_.', "I read this comment on twitter some day, and I found it super precise:

Depression doesn't make you sad. Depression makes you unable to do things - and that makes you sad.

I'm sorry that you have to go through this. The best recommendation I can give is get to a doctor, let yourself checked up. Take medicine, get therapy, whatever helps you.

You can fight depression. It's gonna be hard, but it's worth it.

Stay strong!"]

['My Pile: An accidental case study. 
 <BOLD> PS4 - Rank 2 Survivor

<ITALIC> On PS4, high ranks are nothing but try-hards, teabaggers, flashlight spammers, campers, tunnelers, exploit players.  It's hell, but a daily is a daily.

<ITALIC> Also, I have been playing since release and I have ONE cursed daily...  "Leave with a new item."  Any time I get this as a daily, I die EVERY time OR I get hit with franklin's while running out the exit...

<ITALIC> A habit I have picked up is whenever I open a chest, I take the item to an exit gate and make a pile.  If someone with an item is sacrificed, I shuttle the item over to the gate and add it to MY PILE.  I have had, at maximum, a 6 item pile before.  My theory behind this is simply, if anyone needs anything it is all in the same place and god forbid someone else has my cursed daily, all the stuff is right there on your way out.  Also, if I have my cursed daily, I know where everything is so I can grab it on my way out.

<ITALIC> But over the last few weeks, something amazing happened.

<BOLD> First, there was a leatherface.  One sacrifice, one DC, five gens to go, ruin active...  I had already put two items in my pile and this leatherface took pity on my Nea and a random David and started farming.  I did gens and kept adding to the pile and when it came time to leave, leatherface saw my pile and took a screenshot.  Messaged me after and asked why.  I told him it was for anybody that needed it, and in the case of farming - I was giving David the pick of the loot.  Dude said that was super cool of me and we went on our merry way.

<ITALIC> So...  We all know Legion needs some work.  However, I still have not won a round against him/her.  The second I pop into a round and saw a deep wounds timer, I started in on my pile.  

<BOLD> With this first Legion - 4 item strong pile.  I'm the last survivor.  Gens are done, gates are not open yet.  Remember Me is a thing.  I'm being chased.  I decide to just run to my pile, blood puddles keeping him on my tail.  I crouch by the loot stash and he downs me.

He looks at me...  Takes a long look at my pile...  Spams the pick up and drop until I'm on my feet...  Nods, hits the gate lever, I open it, and I leave.  Tried to message him but his messages are turned off.

<BOLD> 3 hours later I encounter another Legion -  I'm doing gens, unhooking, making my pile.  Comes down to just me.  Gens done, gates closed, Legion hovering between the gates and watching the hatch.  I go to the gate with my pile and pull the lever.

Legion arrives, hits me once, I grab the lever again, he downs me...  Again, he takes a long look at my pile...  Pick-up/drop spam...  Lets me go.  Scoreboard pops up and it's the SAME GUY from before.  Message opens up in the corner of my screen.

I quickly type, "Nice to see you again."

He responds, "OMFG THAT WAS YOU!  Why are you leaving shit at the gate?"

I say, "In case anyone needs it, I'm a nice person."

He responds, "I saw it as an offering, lol!  But that's great, you're doing god's work.  GG."

<BOLD> Rounds against The Spirit, Trapper, and Bing Bong...  They all see the pile, but still murder me.  <BOLD> Rounds against the Clown, he completely ignores the pile.  <BOLD> Billy is too busy NASCARing to care.

<BOLD> But...  Third Legion - Sees my pile and there's still one person alive other than me.  I'm slugged right on top of it and doing figure 8's between the items.  Legion leaves me and I'm just gathering crows, trusting in the pile. 

She sacrifices Laurie...  Comes back to me.  Picks me up and I don't wiggle.  Carries me to the hatch, drops me, and walks away.  I live.  Messages disabled for this killer as well.

I keep testing it...  Surprisingly, <BOLD> Legions LOVE piles and show mercy to those who make them.  Running at about a 70% success rate with Pile Offerings to Legions between Rank 1 and 5.

<BOLD> TL;DR - Don't DC against a Legion on PS4, just offer them a pile of items.

Edit:  Words', "Figured out our Killer's strategy and nobody seemed to understand how... 
 I never play SWF.  Chat audio distracts me from game audio (cause my headphones are dumb) and I also feel like it's a bit cheaty...

Go into the round.  Hear a single nurse blink and then no heartbeat or chase or hits or blinks for three gens...

Go to the last area of gens.  All four fairly close to each other right by one of the exits.  Walk by the exit and premonition triggers...
Thanks to <SUBREDDIT> I happen to know Nurses can hide in there.  Within 10-ish seconds I realize what's going on and message ONE survivor as fast as I can in short chunks so they don't have to leave the game screen to read it.

That survivor takes off and gets the last 2 totems RIGHT as the other two survivors finished the gens.

We all made it out...  These are the messages that took place.

<LINK>

Nurse was rank 17, PIII.  It was a good strategy, but easily countered with the right perks and game insight.", "Dontcha just hate it when people think they're creepster edgelords?", "I live in Pennsylvania.  For most of us here, if you get a pizza you leave the rest in the box after dinner and put the box in the oven overnight.  

Next mornings breakfast is cold pizza.  Cold pizza is the breakfast of champions here and whenever I've shared that with people from out of state they always seem weirded out by it.  It's to the point that some of our local gas stations saran wrap their left over slices from the day before and sell them in the cold case the next morning.  And they sell like hot cakes."]

['How do you make peace with knowing you‚Äôll never get an explanation or apology? 
 My relationship with my parents is complicated, because some days we‚Äôll get along great and I genuinely enjoy spending time with them, but other days things are horrible, along with all the terrible things that happened to me in the past because of them. 

My mom, especially, is the type of person who refuses to take the blame for things and refuses to listen, so I know that if I ever tried to talk to her about my relationship and past with her nothing would come of it, and she‚Äôll never change. 

I don‚Äôt want to go NC with any of my family and don‚Äôt intend to, but as I‚Äôm getting older I feel more and more torn up about how two-faced she can be sometimes. 

So I guess what my question is, is how can you have a relationship with a parent while keeping them at an emotional arms-length distance, and how you do make peace with yourself knowing that there will never be a resolution? I‚Äôve always been the type of person who wants to fix problems so it‚Äôs hard to take a step back and realize that there‚Äôs nothing I can do to change her.', 'Hey! I don‚Äôt know what your set up is like and I know you mentioned a few of these things already, but I‚Äôll try and hit the basics! This reddit is an amazing resource for fish info and you should 100% take advantage of it to the fullest, whether it be general info, questions, anything!

[General tank stuff:]
Bettas need at least a 2.5 gallon tank, and would recommend 5 gallons or more if possible. You‚Äôll need a heater and thermometer for your tank, they do best around 78-80 degrees F (just be careful and do research about the heater you get! low quality ones have been known to cook fish). A filter too of course, whatever the right one for your size tank is. Depending on your filter, you may have to find a way to baffle it, as bettas don‚Äôt like too strong of a water flow. There are lots of ways to do it! People often use sponges or cut up a piece of water bottle, look around and you‚Äôll find some different methods. 

[Decor:]
Lots of hiding places! The more filled your tank is, the happier your boy will be. Just make sure there are no sharp edges or holes he could get stuck in on your decor. Lots of people will use live plants, but fake silk ones are easy to start with! Make sure they‚Äôre silk and not hard plastic, because hard plastic can rip through his fins. 

[Upkeep/Water stuff:]
There are good guides for tank cycling on this reddit, make sure to check them out! Read over the article for fish-in cycling carefully, it‚Äôll be really important for his health. You‚Äôll want to get a good test kit for your water, preferably the liquid kind (it‚Äôs the most accurate). I use purified water for my tank because I‚Äôm in a dorm and there‚Äôs a refiller just outside my room, but tap water is fine as long as you add water conditioner to it to make it fish safe, which you‚Äôll also need to get. I use API stresscoat, but a lot of people swear by Seachem Prime. I‚Äôd also get a gravel vacuum/siphon, a good tank scrubber, and a nice big bucket for water changes. It‚Äôs good to do partial water changes on your tank about once a week, it keeps your water and tank clean!

[Feeding:]
You‚Äôll probably want your staple food to be pellets. They‚Äôre an easy and nutritious way to feed them. I believe there‚Äôs a page on this reddit listing a few high quality brands, but personally I use Omega One brand. I give mine just a few pellets in the morning and a few at night. It‚Äôs also good to give them a little variety! Bettas are insectivores, so they‚Äôll eat things like bloodworm treats, daphnia, fruit flies, etc. 

[Fin rot:]
One of the best things you can do is make sure the water is always warm and clean. I mentioned water changes once a week, but you might want to do smaller ones more frequently until he starts to recover, that way he‚Äôs always got some fresh water. I can‚Äôt think of any antibacterials off the top of my head, but if it worsens definitely come back here!', 'When I was looking into starting T, I wanted to go for patches too because I absolutely hate needles and I knew I wouldn‚Äôt have been able to inject myself. A lot of headaches later, I ended up doing injections instead because I was told a month‚Äôs worth of the patches would cost $600 for me even with my insurance. As a college student handling this entirely independently, that just wasn‚Äôt possible. 

I went to my campus health clinic every week to have them do my injection for me, but after a while was surprised with the fact that I was being charged for this when I thought I wasn‚Äôt, so faced with an extra fee I ended up doing it myself. 

I still hate doing it myself, but it‚Äôs definitely gotten a lot easier. I NEVER thought I‚Äôd be able to before. I pay about $20 for a month‚Äôs worth of T. If you end up going the injection route, I do weekly subcutaneous injections, and with the needles I have, the actual needle part is only like an inch(? or so) long, so if you‚Äôre afraid of the needle ask if you can have a really short one. It makes it a lot less intimidating for me, and reassures me that it‚Äôs literally not possible for me to go too deep.', 'Just brought this beautiful boy home yesterday! Thinking of naming him Valentine maybe?']

['For those who aren‚Äôt fans of rhythm games; Cadence of Hyrule has a fixed beat mode so you don‚Äôt have to worry about missing any beats

['Would it be right to call them one of the most influential bands of the 21st century? So many artists point to them as an inspiration', "Daily Song Discussion - Dan Abnormal (The Great Escape) 
 Dan Abnormal is the song we‚Äôre covering today and it‚Äôs a bit of an unique one. While the song is yet another character study, this character is actually Damon himself; Dan Abnormal is an anagram of Damon Albarn. The song entails that while Damon engages in many of the same activities as regular people, such as drinking and watching TV, his position as a entertainer means he‚Äôs not ‚Äúnormal at all‚Äù in the grand scheme of things.

Musically I‚Äôd say this is one of the most ‚ÄòBritpop-y‚Äô songs they ever made. A big reason for this is the backing vocals, which engage in a chorus of ‚Äòla-la-las‚Äù throughout the song. The track is also notable for being one of the few Blur songs we‚Äôve seen so far to feature a guitar solo, even though the guitar work on the track does remain distinctly Graham.

Lyrical highlight: ‚ÄúDan Abnormal, not normal at all, It's not his fault, we made him this way‚Äù

Musical highlight: Guitar work

Best performance: Damon, Graham

<DESCRIPTION> <LINK>", 'I mean I‚Äôll admit it‚Äôs not my favourite song on the album, and I do prefer the spacey songs on 13 over the more punk ones. But imo it‚Äôs still pretty decent and I think it does fit in the album considering there‚Äôs other heavy punk songs like Bugman and B.L.U.R.E.M.I. If Swamp Song doesn‚Äôt fit then those songs don‚Äôt fit either.', "Daily Song Discussion - Look Inside America (S/T) 
 Next song up in the discussions is Look Inside America, which definitely calls back to Blur‚Äôs previous style and sound. The song‚Äôs lyrics serves as a reflection on the band‚Äôs relationship with America, as Damon claims that despite being forced to pander to the US market through acts such as appearing on ‚Äòsecond rate chat show(s)‚Äô, he has come to accept America for what it is. While it is not his kind of country, he ultimately has to stop trying to ‚Äòmake her mine‚Äô, and come to the conclusion that as a whole, America isn‚Äôt all that bad.

Musically the song bears a very strong resemblance to End Of The Century, to the degree that it almost seems like a musical sequel to that song. It starts simply with Damon and some acoustic guitar before gradually other elements are brought into the song, most notably a strings section that gives the song a nice, dramatic touch.

Lyrical highlight: ‚ÄúGot to play a second rate chat show, It's a nationwide deal, so you got to go, Chuck from the company says it'll be alright, Got an ad on KROQ and there's an in-store tonight‚Äù

Musical highlight: Strings

Best performer: Damon

<DESCRIPTION> <LINK>

<DESCRIPTION> <LINK>"]

['Daily Song Discussion - Ernold Same (The Great Escape) 
 Next song in the discussions is Ernold Same, which functions as an interlude track in the same way that The Debt Collector did on Parklife. Lyrically the song is about the mundanity of modern life, following a man who is bored with his daily life and activities. The voiceover conducted in the song is actually by politician and future mayor of London Ken Livingstone. Musically the song bears a strong resemblance to The Debt Collector, having a musical hall-esque sound complete with strings and a melodica.

Lyrical highlight: ‚ÄúHis world stays the same, Today will always be tomorrow‚Äù

Instrumental highlight: Strings, Melodica

Best performance: Damon

<DESCRIPTION> <LINK>

<DESCRIPTION> <LINK>', 'Daily Song Discussion - Mr Robinson‚Äôs Quango (The Great Escape) 
 Next song we‚Äôre going over is Mr Robinson‚Äôs Quango, which was actually the first song recorded for the album. It‚Äôs lyrics describe one of the more strange characters Damon has come up with so far, an experienced politician who hides his bizarre nature and behaviour from the public. He is part of a ‚ÄòQuango‚Äô (which stands quasi-autonomous, non-governmental organisation), which are mostly known for providing cushy jobs to politicians and their friends and donors.

Musically the song features prominent horns throughout and some more guitar wizardry courtesy of Graham. Alex also delivers some great bass work on this track, while backing vocals again make an appearance - at this point they‚Äôre almost becoming a bit of a trademark of this album.

Lyrical highlight: ‚ÄúHis private life is very discreet, a nicer man, no, you‚Äôre never gonna meet‚Äù

Musical highlight: Guitar work, bass work

Best performance: Damon, Graham, Alex

Talk about whether you like the song, what you‚Äôre first impressions were of it and if you changed your opinion on it over time. Share any memories associated with the song. Link any great live performances of the track. Discuss what you like and dislike about the track etc

<DESCRIPTION> <LINK>

<DESCRIPTION> <LINK>', 'I checked out some of his solo stuff a while back and it‚Äôs honestly really great, it‚Äôs a shame that it flys a bit under the radar, especially in comparison to Damon‚Äôs projects', 'Not OP but I‚Äôd call it jangle pop/rock or power pop.']

['Microwavable stuff never comes out looking like it does on the box', 'Yes! Nice! Thank you so much, you guys rock!', 'There's a FB group called "Atlanta Uber/Lyft drivers unite" with 15k members. Just say ur a brand new driver and your car is in the shop or smth (they're somewhat strict on the "drivers only" group policy)', "We started out with a tray style cargo hitch rack, with the idea that we could toss other stuff (gas, etc) on it too. We never used it for cargo though, and it scraped on freakin everything, so we switched to a hanging-style hitch rack instead. Sits higher up, and lighter to boot.

Our mountain bikes were unharmed despite us (unwisely) leaving them uncovered for 11 weeks / 5k miles. We tied grocery bags around the seats so they wouldn't get soaked, but a tarp would've been better.

Bike racks are definitely something you should buy on craigslist imo. Much cheaper used, and there always seems to be a lot of them on there. Do some haggling, get a good deal :)"]

['I saw this last night and somehow thought it was a room with many charmander pictures on the wall. I just saw the lizard.', 'local man suffers stroke while drawing large breasted women', 'AITB for cutting off my mother 
 My mother was not good to me when I was young, My stepfather was abusive and she not only did nothing to stop this, she seemed unphased. She‚Äôs always been cold. At the time it was me and my older sister, she didn‚Äôt interact with us much at all.  I moved in with my dad at age 11, she divorced about a year later after having two sons with him. After that our relationship started to get better, I visited her every other week.

jump forward a bit, i‚Äôm 18 and I don‚Äôt live with either of my parents. My mom is super involved in my brothers‚Äô lives and cares about them deeply. She‚Äôs not the mother I grew up with, she‚Äôs much much better. The problem is that though she‚Äôs improved and stepped up for my brothers, she has a habit of forgetting I exist. 

For the last few years I‚Äôve had the issue of not being invited to things the rest of my siblings are. This means traditions like thanksgiving and christmas. It‚Äôs an ongoing issue, she isn‚Äôt intentionally not inviting me (at least it seems that way) but legit does not think about me. This is believable for her, if you knew her you‚Äôd understand. 

In march this year I came out as trans, but i don‚Äôt think she‚Äôs used my name once and she and the rest of that family use the wring pronouns, which doesn‚Äôt aggravate me too much because I barely see them. But she had a few times where I saw her refer to my brother as her oldest son. 

A few weeks ago I saw on facebook that her and all my siblings went on vacation together. This includes my sister who doesnt live with her and has her own child. I knew nothing about it. 

I wasn‚Äôt invited to my step brother‚Äôs wedding (she remarried, my new stepdad is great) and for reference this isn‚Äôt a traditional wedding, Around where I live it‚Äôs less formal so you invite whole families more than individual people, I didn‚Äôt know it was coming up, I just saw the pictures.

I never hear from her, I message her every few months, sometimes to check in and sometimes with a question in mind. I try to organize dinner together or a visit. I am the only one putting any effort in and over the past year that‚Äôs slowed down a lot. I thought if I stopped trying it wouldn‚Äôt bother me as much but I honestly hurt more. Seeing my brother‚Äôs being adored and their pictures flood her social media makes me resentful. I don‚Äôt blame them and i‚Äôm glad they get to have a mother but why couldn‚Äôt I? I can understand growth and regret but she makes no  attempt to fix what she messed up with me, just seems to like her new start and people who aren‚Äôt still suffering from her actions or lack of in the past.

I know I sound a bit emotional but it‚Äôs hard to distance myself when typing this up. I want to stop hurting. I think a way to do that is to finally cut that cord, remove her from my social media, stop checking in. The problem being that despite how little we talk, She‚Äôs the only one I talk to on that side of the family. I‚Äôm afraid to loose people including her. Are her sins enough to banish her from my life? AITB for doing so?', 'NTA She was being ridiculous. My sister did the same thing because of the military paying more when you are married, it paid for her wedding. it‚Äôs not deceptive to have a wedding after being legally married.']

["Im pushed my partner a little too much in coming out to her friends and others because I saw how much it upset her to be deadnamed and misgendered and such. It is ultimately up to your partner but I would make sure I stand by them and keep an eye on their mental health. Being closeted can be rough but minimizing contact with those who constantly misgender is a good idea. Either limit hours in a row spent with such people, or days spent in a row, etc. 

Also if they go by they/them pronouns right now, you can slip that in conversations when talking about them (if your partner feels comfortable with you doing so) so that way they may be able to have some confirmation throughout the day. It is very much something you and your partner will have to discuss and make a plan for because mental health wise, its tough territory....


My partner just started socially transitioning about two months ago but before that for about a month is was just her and I exploring her gender. Keep in mind that this is your partner's transition and not yours. Communication is key so that you can keep on the same page as eachother and so that neither of you oversteps. Checking in each day and seeing how they feel  is also good.", 'This is my first time on it! What I am surprised about is how many people dislike being demi...', 'D4 is closest but I am pansexual as well so gender doesnt mean much. I am more attracted to females though bc they are f-ing beautiful but all that matters is personality to me.', "I (21 F) met my girlfriend (19 MTF) a day before halloween. We instantly connected and started chatting. I got her facebook info and we started chatting daily and met up at least once a week to hang out. Early December she admitted to me that she liked me. I hadn't developed feelings for her in that way yet as I am demisexual so I turned her down. Im actually a little upset that I turned her down as hard as I did but we remained friends and I spent the next month getting to know her. 

She invited me over to her aunt's place for new years eve and it was those few days that I started to realize how I felt about her and that I  could consider dating her. At that time though there was this guy that I had liked for quite a while on my mind as well. I ended up telling her a few days later that I liked her but I wasn't ready to date her yet because I liked someone else at the same time too. 

I took my time and walked myself through the pros and cons of each potential relationship and decided that I should try dating her. See what happens.     

Then about a week later I visited her and asked her if she wanted to actually date me. Her face lit up and she said yes without any hesitation! We are still together rn. In fact, she moved in about a month and a half ago with me due to covid and things have been going great!"]

['I am a member of the Religion "Heathenry" AMA!', "For living? Yeah absolutely

For tourists? Not really, except if you're really into foreign culture, but like not sightseeing, beaches and all that", 'AITA for following an unwritten rule? (Is the rule I'm following asshole-ish?) 
 First off english isnt my first language, on mobile, and I'm 20 years old and female.

So I've had this fight with a friend a few weeks ago, and it was because of this unwritten rule I'm following. 

I'll explain it, the rule essentially is: if my BEST friend (not a regular friend) has a reeeeeeal bad fight with an acquaintance, that is also my acquaintance, but I dont know them that much, i dont do stuff with that acquaintance anymore, to stay "loyal" to my best friend (i only do this with my best friend, if the fight was really really bad, and I dont know the acquaintance that well)

What happened in my situation, my best friend, A, had a fight a long time ago with his friend, B
So I essentially stopped talking to B, we didnt know each other that well, I know B wasnt offended by that, I just did go to his house parties once in a while we barely talked.
Now I'm not friends with my best friend anymore, with A.

And I thought about all my past friends and acquaintances and I kinda missed B and his houseparties, so i asked him if he wanted to hang out or something, then I explained why I stopped initiating conversations.
He wasnt offended by that, he misunderstood it, he thought I meant that A forbid me from talking to B, which isnt true.
Anyway, he didnt want to believe my explanation, my rule.
He said "this is just so incredibly stupid and assholish behavior I dont believe this explanation, I don't buy it"
I tried to explain it "it's like: dont sleep with your best friends ex, but like with friendship and without sex"
Then he got offended "that's also bullshit, my best friend did that and I still like him! Your rule is bulshit, stupid and asholish, I dont believe this one second, I dont buy it, nobody would follow that, now why did you lie about A?" 

So I'm asking, is this rule asshol-ish? Am I an asshole for following this rule?

Edit: my english isnt that good, me and B weren't really friends, I think the word I was looking for is acquaintances, we barely knew each other, barely talked, I just did go to his parties, I was always the one who initiated conversations, when I stopped doing that, contact practically broke off.

Edit: changed friend to acquaintance cause my english is bad, sorry', 'I would really like to stay here, but if I had to, I would say somewhere in Scandinavia, Norway or Iceland.']

['There are two flaws with this article.

The first is it using self reporting. Any "Intro to Psychology" class will tell you that the biggest flaw in Self Reporting is that sometimes people will lie for no discernable reason, thus changing the outcome of the experiment. And as an extension of that, there isn't really any way to <ITALIC> prove or <ITALIC> disprove what someone says about there sexuality. It counts as qualia, and falls into the explanatory gap.

The second issue is that there's the possibility that their sexuality didn't change, they just became more aware of it. Using myself as an example, when I realized I was trans, I also realized that I was in the closet about other things as well, and that I was bisexual. People are very good at introspection, but when they do it, lots of stuff tends to come to light.', "Yeah? Catherine and Lily are my faves out of those three. Lily because I'm a big HP nerd, and Catherine has some personal significance to me.", "Lol! Having friends to come out to, that's rich. Did you think that up all on your own? Jk jk



For serious though, I've always had mostly girl friends, but the few male friends I've had accepted me just find.", "This is actually super close to my experience!

I also remember lying in bed when I was 5 and 6, wishing that when I woke up in the morning I'd magically be turned into a girl, but not telling anyone because I was afraid something was wrong with me.

This went all the way up until middle school.

And I also pretended to be a girl on the internet! Although my platform of choice was Chatango.

Actually, though. My dysphoria disappeared for a while, with the exception of small blips, after that. My life was so unstable at the time that I really couldn't focus on anything else. But recently I've been enjoying a long streak of stability in my life, and like it was collecting, just waiting to be let out, my dysphoria is back with a vengeance."]

['This! Or: they look at kids' problems and are like "You're anxious because you have 3 tests this week? This is nothing! At least you don't have to deal with MY adult problems. I wish I had 'just' 3 tests a week instead of having to deal with x".

If you are looking at a problem you've already been through, of course it will be easier for you. But some folks forget that there are people currently going through the same thing and still did not figure out how to handle it.', "that's something unusual to hear lol. Thanks for sharing your thoughts :)", "So there is this thing a friend told me once, cis people don't question their gender identity so if you feel that way you are probably something else? From what you described I would suggest you to look into nonbinary gender identities to see if you identify with something but yea it is totally normal for a nb person to identify with some aspects of their assigned at birth gender (like she/her pronouns in your case)", "I was finally able to organize myself at work and it feels so much better 
 Since I started at my new job a couple months ago I was struggling with organizing my tasks. I get paid by hour and don't have a strict schedule. I have one meeting every day that is always at the same time, other than that I can do my work whenever I want as long as I get everything done by the time they need me to. But because I was so bad at organizing myself, I would just do things straight after they requested something new from me, which resulted in working 10 hours on some days and 2 hours on other days (I am supposed to work around 5 hours each day at this job). 

Today I left a stressful end-of-day meeting with a long list of to-dos. But instead of doing what I usually do and start all of them right away, I wrote everything down first. I estimated how much time I would need to complete each thing, and how much of a priority each thing was. Then, I did everything that would take me less than 10 minutes, and put everything else on my schedule for tomorrow in order of priority.

I am feeling much lighter now as I am neither exhausted after a 10-hour long day, nor anxious thinking I didn't work enough after a 2-hour day. I really like what I do at work, but I am finding it difficult to remind myself of this and be at a good mental state at the end of each day. So I feel like today was a victory!"]

['I may be in the minority here, but I actually don‚Äôt mind Bernie‚Äôs reaction to the endorsement. I‚Äôm not necessarily happy that Joe Rogan chose to endorse Bernie, and I don‚Äôt condone his bigotry (though I think it is sometimes exaggerated). However, I still value reaching across the aisle. We are not going to change the minds of people who watch Joe Rogan by alienating him. And Bernie choosing to receive this endorsement does not at all change what Bernie actually stands for. I know that it is hurtful to be the subject of bigotry. Nobody deserves hate. But Bernie didn‚Äôt bring that upon us. I would argue Rogan didn‚Äôt bring that upon us. Only individuals made those actions.', 'Sorry to rail against the anti-transphobe train, but I think this needs addressing. We are better than transphobes. We have to be better than them if we want to keep them from playing the victim. Yes, transphobes are not good people. But, at the same time, we cannot advocate violence against them. Joking about guillotining them will get trans people demonized. Please don‚Äôt.', 'I refuse to stand by the growth\nof American fascism, even if it creates an opportunity for socialism to step in. Why? I‚Äôm not a socialist. I‚Äôm on the left, sure, but I don‚Äôt see socialism as the ultimate goal. I don‚Äôt want to overturn the US Government. Do I want change? Absolutely. But I don‚Äôt want to get it through violent revolution. You hope you can get Leninism to work, but you can count me out. If my incentive to work is ‚Äòsupport  your country‚Äô then what if I don‚Äôt? Will I be jailed? If so, that sounds oppressive and no better than capitalism. If not, then we will fall into economic decline. That is my view. I think we‚Äôre done here. Nobody has won the argument because we are arguing from different basic assumptions.', 'Dysphoria is real. You still don‚Äôt need dysphoria to be trans.']

['Depends what drug. Weed is legal here. But if I traveled I might have to leave it behind despite it helping me with multiple health issues. I recommend doing some research yourself into Texas drug laws. I am no lawyer. Just my aunt is. But she has had to help people for drug charges, and most of the time they end up doing a plea deal or bargain.  Some for shortened jail time, or for community service instead. The community service is a good option:', 'I don‚Äôt usually feel this way \n I always considered myself Demisexual/Polysexual. because I usually need to meet someone and get to know them before getting aroused. Gender does not seem to be a big deal for me. But recently I started talking to someone online. He is very androgynous. He also seems very chill. I have not even met him in person yet. But he started talking about his height and how long his hair is. He also sent me a cute picture. I am a kinky person. So my mind went to a kinky place. This is not completely new to me. But it makes me nervous because I felt this way about my ex, and we moved really fast. This seems to be a rare occurrence. am I still considered Demisexual? Does anyone have suggestions for how to control myself if I get aroused in person. I am looking to take things slow. And I know from my past that I have trouble if I find someone sexually attractive so soon. I am a little religious and this does play a roll in it. Please be respectful.', 'Everybody Aaaaate Chris! Sorry had to do it. I loved Noah', 'Also I have smoked a prerolls down to the nub. Just do not cut yourself on it.']

['Depends. Do you still get crushes on men? Sexuality isn‚Äôt really about what you used to feel in the past. It‚Äôs about what you feel at this moment.

And also, people always mention stories of straight people having a ‚Äúcurious‚Äù period of their life where they try to be gay or bi, why can‚Äôt the same thing exist for gay people? I think it can.', 'Thank you compliments like this brighten my day :)', 'I used to identify as Cis male and just had a repressed urge to Cross-Dress. One of my best friends came out to me a year and a half ago as trans female and while helping her be more comfortable as herself I started to learn to be accepting of myself too. The cross dressing evolved into being a girl.

My gender fluctuates based on social settings really. At work I feel masculine, while hanging out with male friends I feel masculine, while hanging out with female friends I feel feminine. Perhaps the oddest instance for me is when I‚Äôm on the internet or playing video games I feel most like a girl.

I use he/him pronouns in my day to day life (I‚Äôm still closeted to everyone but 5 people and only 3 of those 5 people accepted me) but my inner monologue uses they/them.

My dysphoria is usually the form of me already being committed to a gender at a social setting but feeling the urge to switch (like if I‚Äôm at work and I‚Äôm a man sometimes halfway through the day I‚Äôll feel like a girl but it‚Äôs too late to switch the role).

I have not medically transitioned and as of now I don‚Äôt feel the urge to.

I‚Äôd say im more inclined as male, but that could just be because I lived life as a Cis male for 23 years before coming out of the closet to myself.

My biggest challenge in day to day life is picking who to come out to. Some people come across as accepting, but really it‚Äôs just to say they check off a list of good human qualities. For example, my sister has always claimed to support LGBT, in fact she came out to me about 5 years ago as bisexual, and she goes to pride parades every year. But when I came out to her as genderfluid she not only didn‚Äôt grasp the concept despite me describing it to her she also was visibly weirded out.', 'Yesterday I wore a Christmas sweater, today I‚Äôm wearing a Santa hat. All in the name of being one adorable femboy/girlboy <3']

["I bought solar panels, but I don't ever have a tax liability 
 EDIT: Thank you all for educating me on taxes. I now see it is possible to take advantage of this tax credit for next year's tax season. I'm just gonna lower my 401k and flexible spending account contributions, and claim tax exempt to give myself a bigger pay check. I guess I can put that money to a Roth instead. I also expect a promotion very soon. With those three factors, it would give me a tax liability that this credit should wipe out when tax season comes around.

OP: I feel like I may have been victimized by predatory sales and lending practices. The system cost about $25,000. I was sold on what I  thought would be a $7-$8,000 refund I would get in addition to the  $5-6,000 I normally get each year from the IRS.

I bought the panels with a loan. The loan has an introductory period, where you  only pay on like $16,000 of the loan, and if you don't give them the $8k  within 18 months the loan goes up to the full amount, and the minimum payment goes up as well. That will make it so that my loan payments on the panels cost more than my electricity did before solar, so that makes going green a luxury for those who make much more money than I do.

So, I'm trying to figure out how to get that money. I've been thinking that maybe there's a way I could do my refund this year that would give me that additional rebate, but that would give me a tax liability next year that would be covered by the solar panel tax credit. However, I don't know how to do that without maybe committing fraud, which would get me in big trouble and possibly have to pay more, and maybe lose my job as well

I'm a disabled war veteran. I'm also looking for legal help to get out of the contract, as I feel like I was scammed.

Any advice? Thanks in advance.", "Growing up, I was one of those poor kids living in Section 8 HUD housing home. Summertime was warm weather for playing outside and a lot of programs in that neighborhood for the break. This wasn't scheduled. 

Odd that working families will be most negatively affected by this, even though they are at low risk. To save the old people, the kids have to suffer... smh", 'Why not? Whats the right sub for women stuff if not this one?', "Thanks for the comment. I don't think the VA health system does that. The cost of medical is moot from where I'm sitting. But just because I served in the military and get free medical doesn't mean people get to assault without consequence. I'll take money if I can't get anything else. Getting money from the insurance company will at least give me resources to sue for an injunction or whatever.

I don't really want to make a working person pay me a few bucks a month for eternity with a lien on the house or whatever uninsured people do when this kinda thing happens. I shed no tears for the insurance companies paying out so that I can get made whole."]

['When I was 9 or 10 I argued with my mom a lot, so much so that my mom would tell her coworkers, all of our extended family about how ‚Äútroublesome‚Äù and ‚Äúdisobedient‚Äù I was. Her boss, who sometimes drove me home would give me lectures that I MUST listen to her and stop arguing.

Then she unscrewed off the doorknob to my bedroom AND the bathroom, allowing them to be opened whenever. I would cover the holes with paper. She would tear them off when I left for school. When she finally put the doorknobs back on, she did it incorrectly, so anyone can barge into my room/bathroom with enough force. She did this repeatedly and once watched me used the toilet while I screamed at her.

Yet I still have counselors telling me I should try and repair my relationship with my egg donor, ffs', 'I had to run a one shot-turned-short-campaign when the corona hit so suddenly, I had no time to develop such a world. I've tried.




Edit: explained more", "What are recipes you would recommend for a 16 y/o cook looking to get more experience with cooking? 
 Hi! I'm not a total beginner to cooking, but I'd like to get more experience in the kitchen. So I plan to go out grocery shopping today or soon, to stock up on ingredients in order to experiment in the kitchen without risking my health. Some recipes I've been considering making are <DESCRIPTION> <LINK>. I will be cooking for my family (if they decide to stop being picky about food) and myself, and maybe trade food with a few of my friends in exchange for their plants.

I come from a Vietnamese-immigrant family, so we may not have access to the full range of spices or ingredients that may be more seen in Western households. I just bought my first bottles of thyme and dried parsley this year :( However I'm willing to get new ingredients so long as I can use it all up! 

I'm looking for easy, satisfying recipes that can be made without high-end kitchen tech. I have an oven, a toaster, a small mini-oven (I think it's called a toaster oven), an air fryer that's rarely used, and a magic-bullet blender to give you an idea of what I have at my disposal. I'm really interested in learning more about every cuisine really. Whether it's classic American or traditional Mediterranean. I also really, <ITALIC> really like Middle Eastern cuisine a lot, so any easy recipes that can help me break into that would be really appreciated. Brador killed his close friend or someone important in the Healing Church; this person could've been anyone in the group assuming Laurence did not just plan to infect a few strong, smart and capable hunters who would make powerful beasts (could be argued that every beast is technically powerful already but we'll save that for another day) but infect as many people as possible, even if they would yield poor results. However, the Healing Church is determined to cover this act up so one would think that this HC member turned Cleric Beast was someone important.

Tl;dr Brador kills VIP. Brador scalps dead VIP and wears his skin. Brador invades any who trespass in the Fishing Hamlet.

['Hey, I have been on the same boat before. I never experienced crushes until highschool and when I did it was always after I befriended someone and had those deep conversations. I still find some people cute and good looking but I would never want to have sex with them. Even with those I dated it took a while before I even enjoyed making out. On two ocasions I was with someone who pushed me a little farther than I would have liked and it did not feel right. Even now, the idea of sex with anyone other than my parrner turns me off. Im 21 now and my current partner has been great!  She has been patient as I have explained how I feel about everything sex related and has allowed me to "warm up" per say to different things. Basically take it in my own time. Even though the attraction is there, the will to do anything sexual took time for me. I think that you should be open with your partner when you come in contact after Covid and only explore as much as you are BOTH comfortable with. 

I consider myself demi all things considered because it is not until I form a friendship and strong connection with someone that I feel attracted. 

Hope this helps and provides some inspiration.', 'I am AFAB and want a penis but I feel comfortable being a female and feminine (boobs and all) so I understand in a reversed kind of way.', 'I think you should tell her exactly as you did here. I have a partner who is ftm and initially considered themself nb. One thing we constantly do is check in and make sure that both parties are comfortable. Especially if you shift where somedays you are more comfortable with your body than others, you should work together with your partner to check in with what you are okay with and what makes you uncomfortable or even sad especially when it comes to dysphoria. I cant say from personal experience, but I have watched it with my partner and from my perspective it hurts to watch her cover up her face or anywhere else when she is dysphoric because I am demi-pan so her body is attractive to me no matter how it looks to her because its her personality that is what won me over. Even though it saddens me, I see how much more comfortable she is and that gives me joy. When she can look at herself and feel like herself.', "I met my girlfriend at a bible college. ['Life is so surreal these days... Almost like a really lame movie.', "Grab a cheap voltage tester.  The times you'll need it are random and unexpected.", 'Survivor Main perspective on what is and what isn't "camping..." 
 <BOLD> PLEASE READ THE FULL POST AND EDITS!

(also, checking out my replies in the comments would be great too.)

Killer LITERALLY staring at the hooked survivors belly button and blocking the unhook action entirely = Bad manners, unfair play, completely stupid because gens will get done faster, takes literally NO skill, and in case you didn't know <BOLD> this is the reason some survivors wait for you at the exit to "teabag" before they leave.

Killer standing 10 to 20 feet away and staring at the hook = Annoying and still not very skillful, but tentatively ok because borrowed time is a thing AND playing the "distraction/protection" game for a while is fun.

Killer using INSIDIOUS and staring at the hooked survivors belly button = YOU ARE WASTING A PERK. Yeah, you have no heartbeat, but we can see you when we sneak up and we turn right the hell around.

Killer using INSIDIOUS and standing 10-20 feet away but OUT IN THE OPEN = YOU ARE WASTING A PERK, WE SEE YOU.

Killer with INSIDIOUS that "hides" nearby but stays very close to stop the rescue = Totally fine, good on ya.

Wraith with INSIDIOUS that stands EXTREMELY nearby (semi hidden) and fakes a cloak at the right moment = AMAZING strategy.

Killer that has traps (hag, trapper) set but still stands at hook or even 10 feet from the hook = You are wasting your special ability entirely.

Killer that has traps and keeps a tight-ranged patrol = AMAZING strategy.

However...

KILLER THAT JUST LEAVES ("hook it and book it") BECAUSE THEY ARE CONFIDENT THAT THEY CAN FIND AND HOOK EVERY SURVIVOR 3 TIMES FOR AN INSTA-DEATH = <BOLD> PRO AS F@$K! I have SOOOOO MUCH RESPECT for you guys!

Also...

I call these <BOLD> "Basement Parties" 

Killer hooks a person, and someone immediately tries a rescue.  Killer gets a grab, hooks number two.  Survivor runs in during the second hooking process.  Starts unhooking number one, but you immediately get a hit and interrupt it.  They take a hot second to STAY RIGHT THERE and try another unhook.  They try, but that hot second let you finish fawning over your weapon, so you down them right away.  Hook one dies, 2 is struggling, 3 gets hooked and is just hanging there.  You make it half way up the steps and survivor number 4 comes running to the rescue, you whack him once and he keeps going down stairs.  You turn around, follow, get the second hit and take him to the fourth hook.  Hook 2 is dead, hook 3 is struggling, hook number four is fresh out of the kitchen.  You either just stand there or walk out.  Hook 4 tries to unhook themselves into the struggling state, hook 3 gives up or dies.  Hook 4 finishes up...  Then the Killer gets hate messages filled with "Camper!" or "Cheater" or "Hack" or "Pussy"  =  <BOLD> Nope, not camping.  Not cheating.  Not a cheap trick.  Not foul play.  Basement parties are ENTIRELY the survivors fault for making bad decisions and not even giving the killer a chance to leave.

<BOLD-ITALIC> <ITALIC> <BOLD-ITALIC> <BOLD-ITALIC> <ITALIC> <BOLD-ITALIC> <BOLD-ITALIC> <ITALIC> <BOLD-ITALIC> <BOLD-ITALIC> <ITALIC> <BOLD-ITALIC> <BOLD> __

<BOLD> Edit 1:  Formatting

<BOLD> Edit 2 in regards to "teabagging" survivors:  A lot of people here are hung up on that statement... If anybody else sees this, respectful people like myself usually wont teabag unless you're a face-camper. Next in line are the people who start out respectful, get burned by campers and butthurt over survivors not being able to save them a bunch, and then become salty players that teabag all the time. Third are all the little idiots from COD that just think being a jerk/rude piece of shit is funny.

So yeah, there are some bad survivors, but this post is coming from someone who usually tries to play a fair and respectful game, gives positive props regularly, sends GG messages even when I get killed... Maybe it's cause I'm nearly 30, maybe it's because I don't like being mean or rude.... But yeah, that's my stance.

<BOLD> Edit 3 in regards to title:  Ok, so, pretend it says, "ONE Survivor Mains Perspective..."  

<BOLD> Edit 4 in regards to killers that are being rude when I mostly sided with them:  I know what a great, skilled killer is.  I only really play survivor, but I also watch my SO play killer most of the time.  He's fair, doesn't face-camp even when survivors are being BM'ing asshats, and he'll still get hate.  

<BOLD> Edit 5 in regards to toxicity in this sub:  Really, can we all be respectful adults and communicate with an open mind?  I mean, a lot of you are...  But some people here just sound like bratty 12 year old Minecraft players that think they're better than everyone and go full banshee mode as soon as somebody proves them wrong.

<BOLD> Edit 6 (come on guys):  Find my comments throughout the thread before you attack me as a whining survivor that's never played killer.  Key points - I never play SWF (that's practically cheating).  My SO is a Killer Main (and I have played killer but I'm rubbish), I watch him play like a boss while being fair and I also get aggravated at bad mannered survivors and if one in particular is being extra disckish, I actually encourage my SO to face-camp JUST that guy.  I respect all of your opinions unless you're intentionally being a rude little shit like it's actually going to hurt me (I've got a 9 year old, that childish nonsense doesn't phase me and hasn't phased me for about 6 years).  Lastly, this post isn't meant to be a "follow these rules" post, or a "You better play like this" post, or a "I hate these kinds of killers" post...  Seriously, I don't care how you play, I haven't disconnected once and don't plan to (even with crazy lag).  What ever you, as a killer, present in the game - I will do my very best to work with it.  If you read the title, I made it VERY clear this was just my <BOLD> perspective.

<BOLD> Edit 7 (FINAL):  "You have to camp in some way or you wont win"  "All survivors teabag and have bad manners"  <DESCRIPTION> <LINK>  My SO played a round last night.  Check it out.  Not everyone is toxic AND a skilled killer doesn't need to camp at ALL.  (Trial is 16 minutes long, worth the watch)', '<BOLD> TOP LINE EDIT:  In light of the downvotes, I imagine people aren't reading this whole thing or are somehow upset that I think parents should not be influencing their kid's decisions.  I'm more than open to hearing what nerves were struck here.  Replies are more than welcome.

The definition of respectful has changed here in 2020.

Honestly, there's no way to deal with concerns like this currently.  You have a huge majority against things such as this for either religious or generally conservative reasons.  Then you have a MUCH louder minority that says everyone should have the right to identify as a street lamp.

If we were to require counseling before a major transgender decision - It would be deemed insensitive and discriminatory.

If we were to ignore this entirely - You have a million confused children swapping genders like a pole vaulter and suffering mentally from the confusion.

There is no doubt in my mind that some people truly do feel like they are the wrong gender and more power to them in correcting their body to match their mind.

But as far as the wave of pressuring kids one way or the other as their parent or moreso riding this "I'm a unicorn" fad-like wave of thought...  It needs to stop.

Example:  I am bisexual (but male leaning).  My daughter has only ever seen me be in relationships with men like her father or the guys that followed after we split but she knows that I have been intimate with women.

For the LONGEST time I kind of got the feeling that she might be into girls.  However, I didn't acknowledge it out loud for a long time.  Two years ago when she was ten, she came to me and asked how someone might know they are gay.  

We had a chat and I told her the following, "You're ten.  The next ten years of your life are crucial in figuring out who you are.  You can feel whatever way you want and you can claim an orientation whenever you want...  But maybe don't.  Don't pick a label just yet.  Be you, explore who you are, and when you're about to graduate high school really assess how you feel.  The problem these days is it's REALLY COOL to have a label that's not considered the norm because it makes kids feel unique.  The thing is, you'll be more unique if you let people know that you're still feeling things out."

She's nearly 13 now.  She has come out as Bi and we are totally fine with that.  I took great care in not influencing this outcome.

I've been flabbergasted by this huge wave of <BOLD> YOU MUST IDENTIFY AS SOMETHING with younger kids because these years are already hard enough with figuring out who you are and where you fit in without adding ten thousand more letters to what used to LGBT.  

Now we have LGBTQSHSRSDFVNKAENRIHNERITU$HW%T^<ITALIC> O<HEADING> H$TQ#OBTV$OHN VTOQ#$TBQN#I$OHTN#Q( or whatever the hell and that really can't make life easy on a young mind.

It was hard enough finding the right people to sit with at lunch...  But that's part of growing up.

Parents stepping into this and adding pressure one way or the other doesn't help and it hinders the child's independence.  It hinders their understanding of the self.

<BOLD> <SUMMARY>  There's no respectful way to deal with this.  Just try to lead by example.  Let your kid find their own identity.  They'll more than likely become a balanced adult of whatever flavor they choose and you can be proud of that.']

['Kinda Malefailed...with facial hair??? 
 I'm so happy, and..confused.

I don't think I'm the least bit girly. I just recently realized that I'm trans, like maaaaaybe 2 months out of the closet to myself. I haven't even started to wear women's clothing or do make-up because I just don't see how I could be mistaken as a woman <STRIKE> and I need to lose hella weight.

Well, tonight my mom and I went to get chinese food, and as we were leaving, the chinese girl called me ma'am, then noticed me, and really quickly called me sir and apologized. I, of course, was oved the moon about her "mistake" and told her not to worry about it.

But what confuses me is that, these last few days have been busy and chaotic, and to my chagrin I haven't been able to shave. I've been out doing things, coming home, passing out. I wouldn't say I'm full blown lumberjack, but I am by no means clean shaven at the moment. I'm a ginger, if that helps.

I'm really happy that other people see me this way, even if it's only briefly, it's still really validating, I just don't see what they see and I wish I did.', 'I have a memory from when I was in middle school. I was a couple of my girl friends "Make-Up test dummy" and they'd try out different things on me. One of their moms was like, "Of course he likes, he's got two girls fawning all over him." But looking back, I just enjoyed hanging out and getting my make-up done.

And I agree. There is just so much that I did just because I didn't know I was able to not do, and a lot of the opposite. Things I didn't do because I didn't know I could do them.', 'It sounds like you've got some misconceptions to deal with, because none of those things are true.

Hormones aren't going to change your sexuality. If your were attracted to women before, you'll be attracted to women will on hormones. It's not CIS or Mysogynistic to find women attractive, there are plenty of LGBTQ+ people that find women attractive.

I feel the word misogynistic is misused here. I think shallow is more appropriate, though I guess there's an argument to say that it's not. My point being, it's not misogynistic <BOLD-ITALIC> OR shallow to find women attractive, it's only misogynistic and shallow if that's <ITALIC> all you care about.

It's <BOLD-ITALIC> okay to find people attractive, and it's <BOLD-ITALIC> okay to want things you don't have. We're only human. What separates good people from bad people is the ability to see things they want, and not just go for them.

My mom used to tell me, in a relationship it "doesn't matter where you get your appetite as long as you come home to eat." There are gonna be attractive people, and you're gonna see them, but as long as you do the right thing, you're fine.

I hope this helps. <3<3<3<3', "Reading through some of these comments, it seems a lot of people are telling you who should and shouldn't be asking about your genitals. However, it seems like a lot of people are forgetting one thing.

<BOLD> Nobody can answer this <ITALIC> for you.

You've gotta sit down and figure out who, and in what context, you're comfortable with talking about your genitals.

I was totally fine talking about mine with my mom, and my therapist, but you might not be. Maybe you're more comfortable talking with a close friend or sibling. Maybe you aren't comfortable talking about it with anyone. It's up to you.", "I've got this cluster-fuck of Depression and ADHD, where I can't just sleep all day, but I don't have the energy or focus to do anything truly productive.

There are so many things I need to and should do, but I just can't gather up the wherewithal to do them. I haven't shaved or bathed in several days, and it's causing my dysphoria to go haywire, but even that's not enough to make me do those things.

I don't have enough money to get meds either, so I'm kind of stuck between a rock and a hard place. I really want to do things that will progress me towards my goals for transitioning, but like everything else, I just don't have the energy...."]
